scripts.build-css: mkdir -p target && npx tailwindcss -i src/css/core.css -o target/main.css && cp -r src/fonts target && cp src/html/* target
scripts.package-and-build-arm: yarn tauri build --target aarch64-apple-darwin && rm -rf ./src-tauri/target/harana_aarch64.dmg && create-dmg --volname harana --volicon './src-tauri/icons/icon.icns' --background './src/dmg-background.png' --window-pos 200 120 --window-size 653 380 --icon-size 115 --icon 'harana.app' 180 189 --hide-extension 'harana.app' --app-drop-link 460 185 ./src-tauri/target/aarch64-apple-darwin/release/bundle/harana_aarch64.dmg ./src-tauri/target/aarch64-apple-darwin/release/bundle/macos/harana.app && mv ./src-tauri/target/aarch64-apple-darwin/release/bundle/harana_aarch64.dmg ./src-tauri/target/
scripts.package-and-build-x86_64: yarn tauri build --target x86_64-apple-darwin && rm -rf ./src-tauri/target/harana_x86_64.dmg && create-dmg --volname harana --volicon './src-tauri/icons/icon.icns' --background './src/dmg-background.png' --window-pos 200 120 --window-size 653 380 --icon-size 115 --icon 'harana.app' 180 189 --hide-extension 'harana.app' --app-drop-link 460 185 ./src-tauri/target/x86_64-apple-darwin/release/bundle/harana_x86_64.dmg ./src-tauri/target/x86_64-apple-darwin/release/bundle/macos/harana.app && mv ./src-tauri/target/x86_64-apple-darwin/release/bundle/harana_x86_64.dmg ./src-tauri/target/
